T02D3261:17a-1: pra sanna t'a r'a y'a:s'a dha nam /
T02D3261:17a-3: sgrol ma rab tu dang ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3261:17a-5: sngar gyi rim pa'i sbyor bas bha ga'i dbus su
T02D3261:17a-6: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la lha mo sgrol ma rdzu
T02D3261:17a-7: 'phrul can gangs kyi mdog ste 'jigs chen ma /
T02D3261:17a-8: spyan gsum ma ste zhal brgyad ma /
T02D3261:17a-9: bcu drug phyag na rgyan du 'gyur /
T02D3261:17a-10: skra khams ser gyen du 'khyil ba 'dzag pa dang
T02D3261:17a-11: ldan pa'i mi mgo brgya phyed kyi phreng bas do
T02D3261:17a-13: skye dgu rnams kyi skyabs mdzad pa'i stobs chen mo dang ldan pa /
T02D3261:17a-14: g-yas bskum pa'i zhabs kyis gnas pa dang ldan pa
T02D3261:17a-15: bzhad pa dang ldan zhing gzhon nu ma lang tshol
T02D3261:17a-16: babs pa / rnam par bkra ba'i na bza' gsol
T02D3261:17a-17: bar gyur pa zhal gyi gtso bo ni ser mo'o
T02D3261:17b-0: babs pa / // g-yas @17b kyi gnyis pa ni mthing nag go //
T02D3261:17b-2: bzhi pa ni nam mkha' ltar sngo ba'o //
T02D3261:17b-3: g-yon pa ni kunda ltar dkar ba'o //
T02D3261:17b-5: gsum pa ni nam mkha' ltar sngo ba'o //
T02D3261:17b-6: steng gi zhal ni du ba'i mdog lta bu ste shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02D3261:17b-7: zhal dbus ma ni rnam par bsgyur zhing tshems gtsigs pa'o //
T02D3261:17b-8: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis ni ral gri dang /
T02D3261:17b-10: mda' dang rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang dbyug to dang gri gug dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya /
T02D3261:17b-11: g-yon pa'i phyag rnams kyis ni zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang thod pa dang gzhu dang /
T02D3261:17b-12: kha tv'am ga dang rdo rje dang zhags pa dang /
T02D3261:17b-13: tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3261:17b-14: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3261:17b-15: g-yon pa'i zhabs kyis ni dbang po ste zhabs g-yas pas ni nye ba'i dbang po'o //
T02D3261:17b-16: zhabs gnyis kyi bar na ni drag po dang tshangs pa yang mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3261:17b-17: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms par mdzad pa rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3261:17b-18: sla bar dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3261:17b-20: aom pra s'nna t'a re za mri ta mu khi
T02D3261:17b-21: aa mri ta lo tsa ne sarba artha s'a dha
T02D3261:17b-22: ni sarba stva ba shyam ka ra h'um phat h'um
T02D3261:17b-24: don rnams thams cad sgrub par mdzad ma 'phags ma
T02D3261:17b-25: sgrol ma rab tu dang ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so
